attributes.action: Give police and fire a bonus for working throughout the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Emergency workers have all risked their life and put their families at risk in order to keep people safe. They deserve a thank you just like the NHS got in recent months.
attributes.background: Consider giving all emergency key worker a thank you like all nhs staff got for working throughout the pandemic.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
